titleStmt.title: A letter from a freeholder in the county of Edinburgh, to his friend in Edinburgh.

notesStmt.note: Wing ascribes a date of [169-?] to an item with this title, however, there is reference made to the Treaty of Worms on p. 8 and a past tense reference to the year 1727 on p. 9.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
